profiles.description: With 20 years of experience in web and graphic designs. I created many design solutions that have high visual impact. I develop creative ideas and concepts, choosing the appropriate media and style to meet the client's objectives. My Portfolio: jayjaro.com I have an up-to-date knowledge of industry software including Adobe and Corel brands and easily redefine a design brief within the constraints of cost and time.

With 20 years of experience in web and graphic designs. I created many design solutions that have high visual impact. I develop creative ideas and concepts, choosing the appropriate media and style to meet the client's objectives. 

My Portfolio: jayjaro.com

I have an up-to-date knowledge of industry software including Adobe and Corel brands and easily redefine a design brief within the constraints of cost and time. 

I'm EXPERT at the following areas: 
Web and Mobile mockups
Logo and Stationery Design
Web banners
Brochure and Flyer Design
Icons, Favicons and Customized buttons
Online newsletters
eBook Design
Billboard and Exhibit Tarpaulin
Magazine and Newspaper Advert
T-shirt Design
Animated Flash banners
Infographics
Photo Editing

Here are some of my client's feedback:

"Highly effective communication and can take directions well, and turn your ideas into something great." - Mobile project

"Goes above and beyond to get a design project done. Communicates well, and can put himself in the mind of the user and develop well-thought out designs." -Landing page project

"Jay's work is always top quality. His turnaround on jobs is impressive and his communication skills are excellent. Jay has done a wide range of jobs for us and for our clients; he can follow specific directions meticulously or provide creative solutions with little guidance." -LOGO project

I am open to do projects that involved developing innovative and technically challenging print, multimedia, web templates, identity, and program graphics.
